title: IT Software Developer NEW!
full_description: We are currently accepting resumes for an IT Software Developer in Columbus, OH.The selected candidate will perform the following duties:- Participate or lead the design, coding, testing, and delivery of software solutions that are consistent with standards and practices- Function as a member of a team and participate in all phases of the software development life cycle (SDLC)- Design, develop or modify code according to standards and practices.- Willingness to develop new skills and learn new programming languages as needed- Quality-focused development practices such as test-driven development (TDD), continuous integration, and pair programming- Passion for making useful, usable products that make our customers' lives better- Use software testing tools to assure the creation of software having the fewest defects.- Lead and participate in code reviews.- Share responsibility and assist team members in achieving goals.Required Skills and Experience: - Bachelor Degree in Computer Science OR Associates Degree in Computer Science with 2 years of IT Software Developer experience OR High School Diploma/GED with 4 years of IT Software Developer experience.- Typically 8 or more years in dominant project language or related experience (in addition to any experience identified above).- Solid in multiple programming languages (Python, JavaScript, C#, Java, Groovy, SQL, HTML, CSS, etc), vb.Net, Oracle Database, SQL Server Database- Experience developing in agile environments- Ability to collaborate and communicate ideas effectively with a broad group of stakeholders- Excellent communication skills- Good problem solving and troubleshooting skills- Processes an advanced level of proficiency in skills and knowledge.Preferred Skills and Experience: - Knowledge of Electric Utilities a plus.- VB6, Excel, VBA (Excel), Windows Services, Windows OS, IIS, GitHub Source Repository, Jenkins (CI/CD) orchestration- Certification in technology relevant to position PreferredUNICON International, Inc. is an Equal Opportunity Employer.If you are interested in working for an organization where honesty, integrity and quality are among the core principles then click apply today!Keywords: Python, JavaScript, C#, Java, Groovy, SQL, HTML, CSS, etc), vb.Net, Oracle Database, SQL Server Database
